item.description:
Update:12:45PM I will be getting to Grendel's Den EARLY (standing outside in Winthrop Square/weather permitting) for the "Lion Dance Parade" beginning in Winthrop square. The dancers will circle around the big oak tree a few times, then go down Mass Ave toward Boston in front of Holyoke Center and ending at the HONG KONG on Mass Ave. The HONG KONG is a few more blocks down on the right (going away from Harvard Square towards Central Square/Bosotn) will be having a Chinese New Year Celebration open to the public from 1 - 3 PM....you do not have to eat there to enjoy the arts, crafts and live performances inside on the second and third floors. At 1:30PM You will find me on the second floor making a Chinese paper lantern. This is event is FREE and hosted by the Lee Family. http://www.hongkongha... Parking is unrestricted in Cambridge on Sundays.
http://boston.going.c...


Happy Hour Snacks + Drinks + Harvard SQ Cambridge at Grendel's Den

Happy Hour is nightly from 5:00 pm to 7:30 pm during which times all food on the menu is half price with a $3 minimum beverage purchase per person.

I will be in the raised half level, beyond the bar, trying to grab the "big round table". Note if we get lots of yeses we may split up into 2 tables. Please try to come at or Before 5:00PM by almost 5:15PM the place is full and I doubt we can get or hold any tables if people come too late.
If you come after 5:15 PM I cannot be sure you all will be sitting together at one table with our group, I just wanted to warn people!

Grendels Den has been serving casual gourmet dishes and international specialties in the same location for over 35 years. They have a full bar and an beer selection reknown for its high quality selection of imports, microbrews and hot cider with rum.

This is an easy T accessible event as well. I hope many of you will be available to join us!
item.name: GRENDEL'S DEN
